scenario_text.value: Ahaha! Floramon, stop. Don’t be silly...
Saki, Floramon, what are you talking about?

Ooh, Takuma, you’ve got to hear this! You
know what Saki just said?
Floramon, no! It was nothing, I was just...

I was thinking back on everything that
happened, and... I don’t know.
(What would Saki have felt looking back on things?)
It was kinda fun?
It was rough?
It was kinda fun?
You were thinking it was kinda fun?

Yeah! Looking back on it now, it was all so
exciting! This world really wasn’t that bad.

Sure. Not everything that happened was good,
but you’re right, it wasn’t all bad either.
Right, like how I got to meet Floramon.
Saki!
It was rough?

You were thinking about how hard everything
was?

Yeah, but it’s not like I was dwelling on
anything. Just... We’ve been through a lot.

She talks about it all with a smile, even
though her life’s been in constant danger.

Well, yeah, because I had you there with me
the whole time, Floramon.
Oh, you’re hopeless.

(I mean, she says that, but then there’s her
illness. I wonder if she’s being honest.)
(Or maybe I’m just overthinking this.)

(Should I press her on it, or would it be
better not to bring it up?)
(What makes more sense?)
You really mean that?
I’m glad to hear it!
You really mean that?

Do you really mean that? Tell me you’re not
just saying what you think I want to hear.
What? I would never...
I’m glad to hear it!
I’m glad to hear it!
Yeah... Don’t worry about me!
Really...

Actually, no. I’m sorry. To tell you the
truth, this is something I do all the time.

Even back in our world, I always tried to
tell people what they wanted to hear.

Honestly, I’ve always been scared of people
not liking me. That’s why I act so nice.

I figured as long as I was kind to everyone,
things would work out.

But I can’t keep doing that anymore. This
world doesn’t work that way.

It left me so run down. And now I don’t know
what’s going to happen when I go back.
Yeah, I can see how that would be scary.

Takuma! You have to say something to her!
Please, help cheer her up!
Oh, right... Uh, hmm...
(What should I say?)
We’d never hate you.
Try to cheer up!
We’d never hate you.

None of us could ever hate you. Even when
you’re not trying, we all think you’re nice.
So don’t worry.
That’s right! You’re the best, Saki!
Takuma, Floramon...
Try to cheer up!

Try to cheer up! Don’t forget, we’re all here
for you.
That’s right, Saki!
Takuma, Floramon...

Thanks. That helped. And you know, I wasn’t
lying about thinking this place was fun.

We’ve had so many adventures here, and I’ve
enjoyed all the time I spent with everyone.
Plus, I got to meet Floramon!
Saki...

Thanks for the encouragement, Takuma! I’m
feeling better now. Ready to head out!
